verses.text: \w After|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w time|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Abimelech, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \w Tola|strong="H8439"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Puah|strong="H6312"\w*, \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dodo|strong="H1734"\w*, \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Shamir|strong="H8069"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim.

Tola \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \f + \fr 10:2 \ft Or governed or led; here and throughout the book of Judges\f* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w twenty-three|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w when|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H8141"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w he|strong="H8141"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Shamir|strong="H8069"\w*. Jair

Tola \w was|strong="H3478"\w* followed \w by|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jair|strong="H2971"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w Gileadite|strong="H1569"\w*, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w twenty-two|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H5895"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* towns \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \w which|strong="H1992"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Havvoth-jair|strong="H2334"\w*.\f + \fr 10:4 \ft Or the villages of Jair\f*

When \w Jair|strong="H2971"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w he|strong="H6912"\w* was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w Kamon|strong="H7056"\w*. Oppression by the Philistines and Ammonites

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Baals|strong="H1168"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* Ashtoreths, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* gods \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aram, \w Sidon|strong="H6721"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* gods \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*. \w Thus|strong="H4124"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w Him|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w burned|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*,

\w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* very \w year|strong="H8141"\w* harassed \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H7533"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w so|strong="H1931"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H5676"\w* \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H5676"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Amorites.

\w The|strong="H5674"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* deep distress.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, saying, “\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Baals|strong="H1168"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* replied, “\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, Amorites, \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*,

\w Sidonians|strong="H6722"\w*, \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w Maonites|strong="H4584"\w* \f + \fr 10:12 \ft Hebrew; some LXX manuscripts Midianites\f* \w oppressed|strong="H3905"\w* \w you|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3027"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H6817"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w Me|strong="H3467"\w*, did \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3467"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w you|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*?

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w Me|strong="H3254"\w* \w and|strong="H3254"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* other gods, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H3254"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3467"\w* gods \w you|strong="H3467"\w* \w have|strong="H6256"\w* chosen. \w Let|strong="H3212"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w you|strong="H3467"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w your|strong="H3467"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*.”

“\w We|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*,” \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. “\w Deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w see|strong="H5869"\w* \w fit|strong="H6213"\w*; \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*!”

\w So|strong="H5493"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5236"\w* gods \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w them|strong="H5493"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w could|strong="H7114"\w* \w no|strong="H7114"\w* \w longer|strong="H7114"\w* \w bear|strong="H7114"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w misery|strong="H5999"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w called|strong="H6817"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* arms \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6817"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, “\w Whoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* launch \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w attack|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.”
